triples.subject: Multi Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Multi Line Trace By Channel 可以替代 Line Trace By Channel 来实现多物体碰撞检测

triples.subject: Multi Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Multi Line Trace By Channel 会返回所有与特定追踪通道发生重叠的Actor和组件

triples.subject: Multi Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Multi Line Trace By Channel 的功能依赖于特定的追踪通道设置

triples.subject: Multi Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Multi Line Trace By Channel 只返回对特定追踪通道响应的对象，而 Multi Line Trace By Object 会返回所有对象

triples.subject: ForEachLoop
triples.context: ForEachLoop 用于处理 Multi Line Trace By Channel 返回的多个命中结果

triples.subject: Break Hit Result
triples.context: Break Hit Result 用于解析命中结果中的 Actor 信息

triples.subject: Get Display Name (Object)
triples.context: Get Display Name (Object) 用于获取命中 Actor 的显示名称

triples.subject: Print String
triples.context: Print String 用于将命中 Actor 的名称显示到屏幕上

triples.subject: 可破坏网格体
triples.context: 可破坏网格体可以通过设置 Trace Response 来控制其对追踪的响应方式

triples.subject: Visibility
triples.context: Visibility 通道的设置可以控制物体对追踪的响应方式（Overlap 或 Block）

triples.subject: Multi Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Multi Line Trace By Channel 常用于游戏物理中的碰撞检测

triples.subject: Multi Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Multi Line Trace By Channel 可以用于射击游戏中检测子弹命中
